layout.title: FMI'{Codes'} 2024
layout.description: FMI'{Codes'} is the annual hackathon organized by FMI, where teams have two days to create an original project on a theme set by the organizers, using any technology. The doors of the Faculty are open all the time, and we from the FSS at FMI are at your disposal on both days.

login-page.title: Login
login-page.heading: Welcome back!
login-page.description: Log back in your account using your email and password or with a linked third-party account.
login-page.by-signing-in-you-agree-to-our: By signing in, you agree to our

sign-up-page.title: Sign up
sign-up-page.heading: Join FMI'{Codes'}!
sign-up-page.description: Sign up for the hackathon by filling-out the following form.

teams-page.title: Teams
teams-page.description: Create a team or join one. See a list of all teams.
teams-page.want-to-be-a-part-of-a-team: Want to be a part of a team?
teams-page.create-an-account-or-login: Create an account or login to create or join a team!
teams-page.create-a-team-or-join-an-existing-one: Create a team or join an existing one!

account-linked-page.title-error: An error occurred during the account linking!
account-linked-page.description-success: You can now go back to the previous page. You will be redirected in 5 seconds.

regulations-page.title: Regulations
regulations-page.description: You can find the hackathon regulations you must follow here.
